gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 100, Magic 97
gameRecap.excerpt: The Clippers held on in a tight one to defeat the Magic, 100-97. Kawhi Leonard (29 points, 11 rebounds, five assists, four steals, two blocks) and Ivica Zubac (14 points, nine rebounds) led the Clippers as Paolo Banchero (23 points, eight rebounds) led Orlando in the loss. The Clippers have now won two straight and four of the last six as they move to 46-27 while the Magic fall to 42-31, having lost three in a row. The Pacers sit just 1 game back of the Magic for the 5 seed with the win over the Lakers tonight and the Magic loss.
